name: Crispy Veg
description: A crisp veggie patty, slathered with delicious mayo, topped with our extra fresh and soft bun!

name: Crispy Veg double patty
description: Our tribute to classic American taste. BK veg Double patty, garden fresh crispy lettuce, juicy tomato (seasonal) & our signature sauce.

name: Crispy Chicken
description: made with 100% chicken patty, seasoned and breaded and carefully layered with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayonnaise on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Crispy Chicken Double Patty
description: Our Crispy Chicken is made with 100% chicken patty, seasoned and breaded and carefully layered with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayonnaise on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Veg Whopper
description: The Plant-based Whopper® consists of a juicy flame-grilled, 100% plant-based*, sustainably sourced soy patty topped with freshly sliced tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Chicken Whopper
description: Our signature Whopper with 7 layers between the buns. Flame-Grilled chicken patty, fresh onions, crispy lettuce, juicy tomatoes (seasonal), tangy gherkins, creamy and smoky sauces with new premium glazed buns. Swaad Aisa, India Jaisa.

name: Fiery Chicken
description: The breaded crispy 100% chicken fillet just got Fierce! Featuring fiery chilli mayo, angry onions and zesty jalapeño slices, this is one spicy mouthful!

name: King fries
description: made from fresh potatoes, golden in colour, and crisp. Enjoy them at their best with tangy Heinz ketchup or creamy mayo sauce
